OOC:Ok I'll care Hevn.

"My doommm???? your you will say"said the male and shot against 
DReadplague 25 times.

"HEY FOOL RIGHT HERE!!" said BlackStorm who shot against DarkAngel 25 
times too

"KILL TYLRAEL; I LIKE HIM DEATH!!!!" shouted Hydras who opened fired 
against tripedocus leader

Hevn noticed that a war was happening, he started to search 
BlackStorm inside the base, when he didn't find her he ran outside 
and started to look for her



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Wolfenstein : :
> 
> Wolf was tackled to the ground, but he flipped up, kicking Tyrael 
off.
> 
> Wolf fires four shots at Tyrael.
> 
> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel observes Maxima's strategic commands, and shoots down 
apon her.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Good vacations man! Ye'll be gettin' drunk like 'n old green
> leprechaun! I'll take care of The Dragoon while you're away. If
> someone would be kind enough to take Kaiser, maybe Stac...
> 
> Bic:
> 
> As Wolfenstein transformed, Tyrael was already taking flight.
> Hopefully, he would tackle him out of the way.
> 
> The Dragoon, though, had no similar problems. He was a newcomer and
> the predacons had not bothered with him yet. He analyzed the 
situation
> and his priorities.
> 
> The Dragoon: Darkangel, we have analyzed and found out that the 
woman
> bot that looks like a transmetal transformer might pose a threat to
> our attack. She is regrouping them. Kill her now. Our directives are
> with Hydras, so we leave this to you.
> 
> (What kind of weapon does Dragoon have?)
> 
> Dreadplague was hit by her assailants, but she was more infuriated
> than wounded. Coming down, she reverted to her battle mode, a large
> and dark  figure in a black cloak, faceless, with a deadly long 
sword.
> Her voice became gravelly and raucous.
> 
> Dreadplague: Come now, Perceptor! Meet your doom!
> 
> She charged, ready to slash anything that would get between her and
> her victim. 
>
